description.p: Basti’s OLED-Saver is a small, lightweight Libadwaita tool that keeps your computer and display awake whenever you need it for extended periods. It offers a simple fullscreen blackscreen mode, perfect for devices with OLED panels to avoid unnecessary burn-in. Basti’s OLED-Saver automatically detects your desktop environment and uses the appropriate inhibit mechanisms for GNOME and KDE so standby doesn’t interfere. The goal was to create a clean, straightforward solution — both as a learning project for modern GTK/Adwaita development and to fulfill a user’s request for a practical everyday utility.

ul.li: This release marks the first stable version of Basti's OLED-Saver, which is now fully compatible with Flatpak.
